problem_text_cn: 如图1,用一根吸管吸吮烧杯中的豆浆,图2是其截面图,纸杯的上底面a与下底面b平行,c表示吸管,若∠1的度数为104°,则∠2的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in Figure 1, a straw is used to suck the soybean milk in a beaker. Figure 2 is a cross-sectional view. The upper bottom surface a of the paper cup is parallel to the bottom bottom surface b, and c represents the straw. If the degree of ∠1 is N_0, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
